data.title: Southwest Airlines
data.meta_description: Why fly Southwest? Airfare discounts from the AFT + Member Benefits program Frequent flight time options Nonstop routes to get you there faster 100-plus total destinations No change or cancel fees Flight credits never expire Bags fly free Get to the fun stuff faster with Rapid Rewards. Your trip could get you closer to your next getaway.
data.text:
Why fly Southwest?

Airfare discounts from the AFT + Member Benefits program

Frequent flight time options

Nonstop routes to get you there faster

100-plus total destinations

No change or cancel fees

Flight credits never expire

Bags fly free

Get to the fun stuff faster with Rapid Rewards. Your trip could get you closer to your next getaway. It’s a perfect perk to go with your airfare discount from the AFT + Member Benefits program.

Exciting Updates coming to Rapid Rewards Program January 1st

Fewer flights to get A-List status (20 one-way flights or 35,000 tier qualifying points)

And fewer to get to A-List Preferred (40 one-way flights or 70,000 tier qualifying points)

That comes with everything from priority boarding to free Inflight Internet, and lots more

Plus, A-List Preferred Members now get two FREE drinks.

Points don’t expire

No blackout dates

Unlimited reward seats

Don’t have an account? Sign up here.

Learn more about new promos and perks specifically for AFT members here.
